    Class FilePathFilter

    API to enumerate the filesystem e.g., by extension

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    FilePathFilter
    Implements
    IFilePathFilter
    Inherited Members

    Syntax
    public class FilePathFilter : IFilePathFilter

    Methods

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    EnumerateFiles(IEnumerable<String>, FileExtensions, Boolean)

    Extracts valid paths or paths with a specified extension from a collection of paths. The path collection can be a mix-up of files and folders. In case the path describes a folder, the extension filter will be applied to all containing files.

    Declaration
    public IEnumerable<FileInfo> EnumerateFiles(IEnumerable<string> folderPath, FileExtensions fileExtensionsToCollect, bool isIncludingSubdirectories)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String> folderPath
    FileExtensions fileExtensionsToCollect

    The flagged Enum type that defines one or more extensions to filter from the folder.
    System.Boolean isIncludingSubdirectories

    Sets the filter whether to apply to sub directories or not. True includes subdirectories and False ignores them. Is false by default.
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.FileInfo>

    A enumerable collection of System.IO.FileInfo.
    Remarks

    To ignore file extensions and collect all files found pass the value.

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    EnumerateFiles(IEnumerable<String>, FileExtensions, EnumerationOptions)

    Extracts valid paths or paths with a specified extension from a collection of paths. The path collection can be a mix-up of files and folders. In case the path describes a folder, the extension filter will be applied to all containing files.

    Declaration
    public IEnumerable<FileInfo> EnumerateFiles(IEnumerable<string> folderPath, FileExtensions fileExtensionsToCollect, EnumerationOptions enumerationOptions)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String> folderPath
    FileExtensions fileExtensionsToCollect

    The flagged Enum type that defines one or more extensions to filter from the folder.
    System.IO.EnumerationOptions enumerationOptions

    An instance of System.IO.EnumerationOptions to configures the enumeration behavior.
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.FileInfo>

    A enumerable collection of System.IO.FileInfo.
    Remarks

    To ignore file extensions and collect all files found pass the value.

    EnumerateFiles(IEnumerable<String>, Predicate<FileInfo>, Boolean)

    Extracts valid paths or paths with a specified extension from a collection of paths. The path collection can be a mix-up of files and folders. In case the path describes a folder, the extension filter will be applied to all containing files.

    Declaration
    public IEnumerable<FileInfo> EnumerateFiles(IEnumerable<string> folderPath, Predicate<FileInfo> filterPredicate, bool isIncludingSubdirectories)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String> folderPath
    System.Predicate<System.IO.FileInfo> filterPredicate

    A delegate used to filter the System.IO.FileInfo items.
    System.Boolean isIncludingSubdirectories

    Sets the filter whether to apply to sub directories or not. True includes subdirectories and False ignores them. Is false by default.
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.FileInfo>

    A enumerable collection of System.IO.FileInfo.
    Remarks

    To ignore file extensions and collect all files found pass the value.

    EnumerateFiles(String, FileExtensions, Boolean)

    Extracts valid paths or paths with a specified extension from a collection of paths. The path collection can be a mix-up of files and folders. In case the path describes a folder, the extension filter will be applied to all containing files.

    Declaration
    public IEnumerable<FileInfo> EnumerateFiles(string folderPath, FileExtensions fileExtensionsToCollect, bool isIncludingSubdirectories)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.String folderPath

    The path to the folder to filter.

    Sets the filter whether to apply to sub directories or not. True includes subdirectories and False ignores them. Is false by default.
    Returns

    EnumerateFileSystem(IEnumerable<String>, Predicate<FileSystemInfo>, Boolean)

    Extracts valid paths or paths with a specified extension from a collection of paths. The path collection can be a mix-up of files and folders.

    Declaration
    public IEnumerable<FileSystemInfo> EnumerateFileSystem(IEnumerable<string> pathEntries, Predicate<FileSystemInfo> filterPredicate, bool isIncludingSubdirectories = false)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String> pathEntries

    A string collection holding folder and/ or file paths filter.
    System.Predicate<System.IO.FileSystemInfo> filterPredicate

    A delegate used to filter the System.IO.FileSystemInfo items.
    System.Boolean isIncludingSubdirectories

    Sets the filter whether to apply to sub directories or not. True includes subdirectories and False ignores them. Is false by default.
    Returns
    Type Description
    System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.IO.FileSystemInfo>

    A enumerable collection of System.IO.FileInfo.
    Remarks

    To ignore file extensions and collect all files found pass the value.
